about.description: Mahotas-imread is a simple module to read images into numpy arrays.

name: imread
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "imread" %}
{% set version = "0.6" %}
{% set sha256 = "97364c44b9861ebd74dbf9a7cafea604a802543b3a9b463c9de68befed72d86c" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script:
    - cp %LIBRARY_LIB%\libpng.lib %LIBRARY_LIB%\png.lib  # [win]
    - python setup.py build_ext --include-dirs=${PREFIX}/include  # [unix]
    - python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
    - del %LIBRARY_LIB%\png.lib  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - toolchain
    - numpy x.x
    - msinttypes  # [win]
    - jpeg 9.*
    - libpng >=1.6.28,<1.7
    - libwebp 0.5.*
    - libtiff 4.0.*
    - zlib 1.2.*  # [win]

  run:
    - python
    - numpy x.x
    - jpeg 9.*
    - libpng >=1.6.28,<1.7
    - libwebp 0.5.*
    - libtiff 4.0.*
    - zlib 1.2.*  # [win]

test:
  imports:
    - imread

about:
  home: https://imread.rtfd.io/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: COPYING.MIT
  summary: 'imread: Image reading library'

  description: 'Mahotas-imread is a simple module to read images into numpy arrays.'
  doc_url: https://imread.rtfd.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/luispedro/imread

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - luispedro

about.description: Mahotas-imread is a simple module to read images into numpy arrays.
